note:
The Fedora Design Team is Fedora’s in-house design agency. We provide artwork, user experience, usability, and general design services to the Fedora project. We are one of the Fedora Mindshare teams.

This account is administered by Máirín Duffy and Madeline Peck. You can contact us on the team Matrix chat here: https://matrix.to/#/#design:fedoraproject.org
